task_data.title: Replace token budget pie chart with AUTONOMOUS PRODUCTIVITY METRICS chart showing system's incredible progress\! Create a multi-line time-series chart tracking: 1) Tasks completed per day (green line trending UP), 2) Autonomous commits per day (blue line), 3) Worker success rate % (purple line), 4) Average task completion time trending DOWN (orange line). Add sparklines showing 7-day trends. Include exciting stats cards: 'Total Autonomous Commits', 'Hours Saved', 'Tasks Completed Today', 'Current Streak'. Make it visually stunning with animations, gradients, and celebration effects when milestones hit. Title: 'ðŸš€ Autonomous Productivity Analytics'. This will showcase the system's exponential improvement and make users excited about the progress\!
